examples.example: 我喜欢在早餐时喝一杯美味的酸奶，开启充满活力的一天。

translate.english: I like to drink a cup of delicious yogurt at breakfast to start a vibrant day.

examples.example: 我每天都会喝一杯酸奶，让自己拥有健康快乐的生活。

translate.english: I drink a cup of yogurt every day to make myself have a healthy and happy life.

examples.example: 今天买的酸奶口感醇厚，给我带来了愉悦的享受。

translate.english: The yogurt bought today has a mellow taste and brings me pleasant enjoyment.
